    results = []
    for x, y, z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_close = all_close([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_light_grey = is_light(x, ctx) and is_grey(x, ctx)
        check_yz_dark = all([is_dark(dot, ctx) for dot in [y,z]])
        check_yz_right = are_right([y,z], [x], ctx)
        if (
            check_xyz_close
            and check_x_light_grey
            and check_yz_dark
            and check_yz_right
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results
